name: Factory Bounce
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN on most browsers besides Firefox so you don't drag outside of the window which causes bugs because it stops receiving mouse input.

A speedrunning game about bouncing off walls. My best added times are 54.346 seconds, hopefully someone can beat it!

Not my best work but I'm pretty proud of it. Made it in abount two weeks from a scrapped prototype for a game jam.

Save data may not work super well in the browser depending on settings and stuff.

Made in Godot, art in Aseprite, music in Lmms, and sound effects in Audacity.
